raw_json.html_title: Example 7.15: A more complex sales graphic | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Example 7.15: A more complex sales graphic

Posted on October 13, 2009 by Ken Kleinman in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on SAS and R, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

The plot of Amazon sales rank over time generated in example 7.14 leaves questions. From a software perspective, we’d like to make the plot prettier, while we can embellish the plot to inform our interpretation about how the rank is calculated.For the latter purpose, we’ll create an indicator of whether the rank was recorded in nighttime (eastern US time) or not. Then we’ll color the nighttime
